attributes.action: Allow fathers to have more rights over their children.
attributes.background: When a man and women are together some women expect the man to pay for everything. However, when they have a child and they break up then the father doesn't have as much rights as a women. Even if the mother sadly passes away the child will go to the mothers family. Fathers need more rights.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
